    • Method Detail

      • pingAll

        private void pingAll()
        Pings every client in every game.

      • addClient

        public void addClient(ClientInterface client)
               throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Adds a client to an existing board or to a new board, per game mode. If the player was already playing and it's DISCONNECTED, the player will be added back to the previous board.
        Specified by:
        addClient in interface ServerInterface
        Parameters:
        client - to be added
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException - in case of network problems

      • getPendingGame

        public BoardController getPendingGame(boolean domination)
        Finds a game in LOBBY with a free spot for a player and with a certain game mode selected.
        Parameters:
        domination - determines if the game should be in domination mode.
        Returns:
        a board controller or null no free boards exist.

      • getGameByClient

        public BoardController getGameByClient(ClientInterface client)
                                throws InvalidPlayerException
        Gets a board from a client.
        Specified by:
        getGameByClient in interface ServerInterface
        Parameters:
        client - the client to be found
        Returns:
        the board in which the client is playing
        Throws:
        InvalidPlayerException - if the client doesn't exists or isn't playing in any board

      • getGameByPlayer

        public BoardController getGameByPlayer(Player player)
                                throws InvalidPlayerException
        Gets a board from a player.
        Specified by:
        getGameByPlayer in interface ServerInterface
        Parameters:
        player - the player to be found
        Returns:
        the board in which the player is playing
        Throws:
        InvalidPlayerException - if the player doesn't exists or isn't playing in any board

      • isPlayerConnected

        public boolean isPlayerConnected(java.lang.String name)
        Verifies if a connected player with a given name exists.
        Parameters:
        name - name of the player to be found.
        Returns:
        true if there is a connected player (playerStatus != DISCONNECTED) with the specified name, false otherwise

      • getGameByPlayerName

        public BoardController getGameByPlayerName(java.lang.String name)
        Gets the board where a player with the specified name exists.
        Parameters:
        name - name of the playe to be found
        Returns:
        the board in which the player is playing or null
